title: Adult Mental Health First Aid Training
desc: Mental Health First Aid (MHFA): ? MHFA is the initial help given to someone who may be developing a mental illness or experiencing a mental health crisis. The aid provided is not a substitute for professional help, but may help in stabilizing the person until appropriate professional or other assistance can be engaged. ? About the Course:  ? This one day?8-hour certification course teaches  non- mental health ? professionals  how to give first aid to individuals experiencing a mental health crisis and/or who are in the early stages of a mental health disorder. Participants learn the sign and symptoms of the most common mental health problems, where and when to get help, and types of help shown to be effective. ? Who Should attend this one day training? ? Mental Health First Aid course is geared to a variety of audiences and these sessions are limited to  non- mental health professionals  working in NYC. ? ? Training times ? ?8:30- 5:30 pm  ? For more information please contact Samara Ahmed at sahmed8@health.nyc.gov ? ? **If you have already attended a MHFA training session please do not register to attend another.?
